Right.

Remember, today is only a half a day.

-Monkey boy. -Summer!
Summer! Summer!

-Okay. -Hey, Mrs. Lamonsoff, good to see you.

Thank you. Have a great day.
-Did Mommy make the boo-boo go away? -Don't tell the wife.

translation.en: -What are you guys doing? -Get in.
Oh, hey, Nick.
Nice. Nice. Let's hit it.
Watch this.
-You got to respect that. -That was awesome.
What's Lenny's problem? They're so cute when they're little.

translation.en: I know. I miss it.
Hey, Ronnie. Ronnie.
You miss that? Really?
Stay. Stay. Don't you growl at me.
Stay, baby, stay.
Excuse me.
Is your kid gonna be in here when the instructor comes in?
translation.it: Tuo figlio resta per la lezione?

translation.en: That's not my kid.
That's my lover, and he's very gentle.
translation.it: È il mio amante ed è molto dolce.

translation.en: Kids don't belong in here.
translation.it: I bambini non possono stare qui.

translation.en: That leash better not trip me up.
translation.it: Spero di non inciampare nel guinzaglio.

translation.en: Leash isn't gonna trip you up.
translation.it: Non cadrai per colpa del guinzaglio.

translation.en: It's your big-ass, hairy man feet that are gonna trip you up.
translation.it: Ma per quel culone e quei piedoni pelosi da uomo.

translation.en: She was just joking around, sir.
Cool it. You're gonna get us killed.
I'm sorry. I'm having the worst day.
translation.it: Scusa. La giornata è iniziata male.

translation.en: Welcome to Squat Fitness, ladies.
Apparently your new instructor's running a bit late.
translation.it: A quanto pare, il nuovo istruttore è in leggero ritardo.

translation.en: I'm sorry. It's only five till--
Yeah, so he asked me to lead you in some warm-up exercises.
translation.it: Sì, mi ha chiesto di farvi fare un po' di riscaldamento.

translation.en: So, everybody, up on your feet...
...and let's take a deep breath.
Good. Deeper. Really stretch out those lungs.
translation.it: Bene. Più profondo. Aprite quei polmoni.

translation.en: And now let's shimmy. Shake the shoulders back and forth.
translation.it: E ora rilassatevi. Scuotete le spalle.

translation.en: Shake them. Very good, very good.
translation.it: Avanti e indietro. Molto bene, brave.

translation.en: Yeah. Oh, yeah.
Now let's do some jackhammer squats.
translation.it: Ora facciamo l'esercizio del martello pneumatico.

translation.en: Put your hands in front of you like this. Just relax.
translation.it: Unite le mani davanti a voi e rilassatevi.

translation.en: And then squat up and down but fast. Faster, faster, there you go.
translation.it: Fate dei piegamenti sulle gambe. Più veloci, così.

translation.en: Really fast. Faster, faster. Too fast. Do it a little slower.
translation.it: Velocissime. Di più. Troppo. Ora più lentamente.

translation.en: Now, everybody turn, face the back of the room, bend over...
translation.it: Adesso giratevi con la faccia rivolta verso la parete in fondo

translation.en: ...and reach for your toes.
translation.it: e toccatevi le punte dei piedi.

translation.en: -Why do we have to turn around? -If you please.
And bend over as low as you can go.
Now take the right hand and slap it against the right cheek.
translation.it: Ora, con la mano destra, datevi delle pacche sulla chiappa destra.

translation.en: Relax the wrist and slap that right butt, slap it.
translation.it: Rilassate il polso e sculacciatevi la chiappa.

translation.en: Good, I want to hear that slap.
Yes, this is wonderful.
Morning, ladies.
-You started without me? -Yes, just like you asked me to.
translation.it: Avete iniziato senza di me? Sì, come mi avevi chiesto tu.

translation.en: -Say it's true even if it isn't. -What?
translation.it: Di' che è vero anche se non lo è. Cosa?

translation.en: You loved it! You loved it!
Yeah, that's my boy.
-All right. -You're all prostitutes!
Anyway, I'm Kyle...
...and welcome to the summer session of Squatrobics 101.
translation.it: Benvenute al corso estivo per principianti di Squat-robica.

translation.en: I wish they called it something else, but that's what they told me to say.
translation.it: Io gli avrei dato un altro nome, ma mi hanno detto di chiamarlo così.

translation.en: Okay, so, before we start for real, any questions?
translation.it: Prima di iniziare sul serio, avete domande?

translation.en: -Yes. -Are you married?
No. Nope, I'm single.
-Yeah. -I forgot.
translation.it: Prego. Ho scordato la domanda. Tutti quei muscoli mi fanno girare la testa.

translation.en: You're so gorgeous, my head is spinning. I'm sorry. God.
translation.it: Ho scordato la domanda. Tutti quei muscoli mi fanno girare la testa. Scusate. Oddio.

translation.en: Go ahead.
I have a very important question, and it's a two-parter.
translation.it: Ho una domanda importantissima ed è in due parti.

translation.en: The first part of the question is, did a scientist make you in a lab?
translation.it: La prima parte è: "Sei stato creato in laboratorio?"

translation.en: And the second part of the question is...
...can I stick my tongue down your throat, please?
translation.it: "Posso infilarti la lingua in bocca?" Ragazze, sono lusingato. Grazie, davvero.

translation.en: All right, guys, look, I'm flattered. Really, I am.
But most of you are married, and I happen to be gay.
translation.it: Ma siete quasi tutte sposate e si dà il caso che io sia gay.

translation.en: -Gay. All of them. -That sucks! What a waste!
translation.it: Ti pareva. -Sono tutti gay. -Che palle! Che spreco!

translation.en: -Stay out of my bag, little man. -Why does she have this?
translation.it: Lascia la mia borsa, ometto. Perché lei ha queste?

translation.en: That's not a jock strap, that's a G-string.
translation.it: Non è un sospensorio. È un perizoma.

translation.en: Well, well, well...
...if it isn't Hollywood...
...and the Squares.
Hey, Malcolm, I didn't know you worked at Kmart...
translation.it: Malcolm, non sapevo che lavorassi da Kmart.

translation.en: ...and apparently the hair on top of your head didn't know it, either.
translation.it: Sembra che neanche i tuoi capelli siano stati informati.

translation.en: What?
Do me a favor, go like this. I think I got something in my teeth.
translation.it: Fammi un favore. Chinati così. Ho qualcosa tra i denti.

translation.en: -What? -You know,
next time, you should use that Chia Pet stuff on your whole head.
translation.it: la prossima volta prova a darti un po' di concime.

translation.en: What?
Why is Higgins buying O.J.'s knife right now?
translation.it: Perché Higgins sta comprando il coltello di O.J.?

translation.en: -You think you're tough? -Hey, Malcolm,
is that the knife the Indians used to half-scalp you with?
translation.it: è con quello che gli indiani ti hanno fatto lo scalpo?

translation.en: I don't even get that. What?
Come on, let's cheer him up Benny Hill-style. Here we go.
translation.it: Dai, tiriamolo su. Stile Benny Hill. Ecco.

translation.en: -Come on, come on, come on. -Does that make you feel better?
translation.it: Dai, dai, dai. Ti senti meglio?

translation.en: Yo, Crocodile Dumb-dee, how'd it go with the kid?
translation.it: Ehi, Crocodile Dundee dei poveri, com'è andata col ragazzo?

translation.en: Good, good. He's in school.
Kid's in school for one day?
translation.it: Va a scuola per un giorno solo?

translation.en: I didn't know what else to do. He's a thug, Lenny.
translation.it: Non sapevo cos'altro fare. È un teppista, Lenny.

translation.en: He cut the head off a teddy bear. Imagine what he'll do to me.
translation.it: Ha mozzato la testa all'orsacchiotto. Cosa farà a me?

translation.en: So you're gonna buy this to cut his head off?
translation.it: Quindi compri il coltello per tagliargli la testa?

translation.en: No, I just want him to think I'll cut his head off...
...so then he won't cut my head off.
translation.it: così lui non taglierà la mia.

translation.en: You want to scare a relative without causing permanent injury?
translation.it: Vuole spaventare un parente senza provocare danni permanenti?

translation.en: May I suggest this?
translation.it: SPRAY AL PEPE Posso suggerire questo?

translation.en: Sir? Sir? Can you get off the bed?
translation.it: Signore? Mi scusi? Può alzarsi dal letto?

translation.en: It's wake-up time!
All right, Grandma, I'm up! Stop yelling at me.
translation.it: Va bene, nonna, mi alzo! Smettila di urlare.

translation.en: Now, why is...? Being mean?
I like sleeping over. It's just you always yell.
translation.it: Mi piace dormire qui. Non c'è bisogno di urlare.

translation.en: You don't have to yell at me.
I love you.
I don't understand.
Clean-up, aisle nine.
Get out of me!
And bring a shovel.
So my son Bumpty told me...
translation.it: Mio figlio Bumpty mi ha detto

translation.en: ...he's gonna ask your daughter out on a date at school today.
translation.it: che oggi a scuola avrebbe chiesto a tua figlia di uscire.

translation.en: First of all, my daughter's never been out on a date before...
translation.it: Prima di tutto mia figlia non è mai uscita con nessuno

translation.en: ...and I'm sure she's not gonna start off with some kid named Bumpty.
translation.it: e non inizierà certo con uno che si chiama Bumpty.

translation.en: He is the only other black kid in her grade.
translation.it: È l'unico ragazzo nero del suo anno.

translation.en: Wait, you want her to date a white guy?
translation.it: Vuoi forse che esca con un bianco?

translation.en: Yeah, Farrakhan.
I'd rather she date the whitest white guy in the world...
translation.it: Preferisco che esca col più bianco del mondo

translation.en: ...than your little bald-headed boy.
translation.it: piuttosto che col tuo ragazzo pelato.

translation.en: All right, but, you know, don't worry when she says yes...
translation.it: Va bene, ma se accetterà non preoccuparti,

translation.en: ...because I already had the talk with him.
translation.it: ho parlato già parlato con lui.

translation.en: -What talk? -Dating.
I told him how we used to roll with the ladies in high school.
translation.it: Gli ho raccontato come facevamo noi con le ragazze.

translation.en: You know, beep-beep.
What?!
I should get some pepper spray for my kid.
translation.it: Dovrei comprare lo spray al pepe per mio figlio.

translation.en: Some moron on the bus keeps messing with him...
translation.it: Un ragazzo lo maltratta sullo scuolabus

translation.en: ...and he refuses to fight back.
translation.it: e lui si rifiuta di reagire.

translation.en: You know, that reminds me of someone I know.
-Who? -You.
What are you talking about? I got in plenty of fights.
translation.it: Ma cosa dici? Io mi battevo sempre.

translation.en: Remember ninth grade when Tommy Cavanaugh...
...moved here from Texas?
He nonstop abused you, and you did nothing about it.
translation.it: Te ne faceva di tutti i colori e tu lo lasciavi fare.

translation.en: Tommy Cavanaugh was a 'roid freak.
translation.it: Tommy Cavanaugh era pompato di steroidi.

translation.en: He had back zits on his back zits.
translation.it: Aveva la schiena piena di brufoli.

translation.en: Plus, he was joking around with me.
If it was real, I swear to God, I would've knocked him out.
translation.it: Se avesse fatto sul serio, vi assicuro che l'avrei steso.

translation.en: -Hey, isn't that Cavanaugh right there? -Where?
-Gotcha. -That was really funny, man. Really funny.
Hey, you weren't exactly Captain Courageous when we were growing up, were you?
translation.it: Neanche tu eri Capitan Coraggio, quando eravamo ragazzi.

translation.en: Hey, I never backed out of a fight, though.
translation.it: Ma non ho mai rinunciato a battermi.

translation.en: Yeah, but did you ever jump off Suicide 35 at the quarry?
translation.it: Ma non ti sei mai tuffato dal Suicidio 10, alla cava.

translation.en: That's right. He always came up with a lame excuse not to do it.
translation.it: Ha ragione. Trovava sempre qualche scusa ignobile.

translation.en: -What are you talking about? -"I can't. I'm on my period. It'll attract sharks."
translation.it: -Ma cosa dite? -"Non posso." "Ho le mie cose. Attirerò gli squali."

translation.en: Suicide 35 off the top rock. Thirty-five feet above the water.
translation.it: Il Suicidio 10, lo scoglio a 10 metri dall'acqua.

translation.en: My mom did that jump when she was pregnant with me.
translation.it: Si è tuffata da lì persino mia madre, quando era incinta di me.

translation.en: There's a raft in there?
Who did that?
All right, little birds, find your nests, man.
translation.it: Bene, uccellini. Trovate il vostro nido.

translation.en: Float down. There we go, and we're in.
All right, guys, normally we don't have exciting news this late into the term...
translation.it: Allora, ragazzi, di solito non arrivano grandi notizie alla fine della scuola,

translation.en: ...but we have a new student joining us today, Braden Higgins.
translation.it: ma oggi avete un nuovo compagno di classe, Braden Higgins.

translation.en: Hey, there's an empty seat over there, man. Why don't you go cop a squat.
translation.it: C'è un posto libero laggiù. Perché non lo fai subito tuo?

translation.en: Or go that way, man.
Take your own path.
I sit here.
Is your dad Marcus Higgins?
Yeah, I've known him since I was a baby. He's the funniest.
translation.it: Lo conosco da quando sono nato. È simpaticissimo.

translation.en: The best. Great, great man.
I want to smash his face.
-Yeah, me, too. -Yeah, I hate that guy.
Screw him.
Yo, Charlotte, hold up, hold up. Question:
How would you like to spend the first night of summer...
translation.it: Che ne dici di passare una serata spumeggiante

translation.en: ...with a hardcore up-and-comer?
translation.it: con un tipo estremo dal futuro promettente?

translation.en: -What does that mean? -I think he's asking you out.
translation.it: Che significa? Credo ti stia chiedendo di uscire.

translation.en: He is? You are?
-I don't make stuff up. -Well, can Donna come?
translation.it: Non ci giro intorno. Può venire anche Donna?

translation.en: Three's a crowd, McCloud. No, he didn't. Yes, he did.
translation.it: In tre siamo in troppi, anche se zoppi. No, non l'ha chiesto. Sì, l'ha chiesto.

translation.en: It's okay, Charlotte. It's a date, your first date. Just you two.
translation.it: Non fa niente, Charlotte. È il tuo primo appuntamento. Sarete solo voi due.

translation.en: All right. I mean, I'd have to ask my parents...
translation.it: Va bene. Cioè, devo chiederlo ai miei genitori,

translation.en: ...but I think that would be okay.
translation.it: ma credo che mi diranno di sì.

translation.en: Hey, Bumpty. You think just because it's the last day of school...
translation.it: Ehi, Bumpty. Credi di approfittare dell'ultimo giorno di scuola

translation.en: ...you can sit and socialize the entire period?
translation.it: per startene lì senza far niente?

translation.en: I don't think about stuff like that, Lady Shorts.
translation.it: Non credo niente del genere, sig. Pantaloncini da Donna.

translation.en: Well, can you think fast?
Who wants to watch me climb a rope?
translation.it: Chi vuole guardare come mi arrampico sulla fune?

translation.en: Yeah!
You're the man!
Yo, he's got to put those Easter eggs back in the basket. Dang!
translation.it: Fossi in lui, rimetterei le uova di Pasqua nel cestino. Accidenti!

translation.en: Kelly, I don't want to hear it! I can't take it anymore!
translation.it: Kelly, smettila! Non ce la faccio più!

translation.en: I wish I never had you! Stop it! Stop it!
translation.it: Vorrei non averti mai avuto! Basta!

translation.en: See, that's why I don't want four kids.
translation.it: Ecco perché non voglio quattro figli.

translation.en: Yeah, people with four just lose their minds. They're yelling, they're screaming.
translation.it: -Ti fanno andare fuori di testa. -Sì. Urlano, strillano.

translation.en: Sometimes they go to jail just to get some sleep.
translation.it: Per riposarsi un po' bisogna andare in galera.

translation.en: Hold up. Hang on. I got a burpsnart coming.
translation.it: Un momento, fermi. Tripletta in arrivo.

translation.en: -Come on. -You got to teach me how you do that.
A burpsnart? It's simple. You just start with a burp...
translation.it: -La tripletta? È facile. -Sì. Inizi col rutto,

translation.en: ...then you sniff for a sneeze, you get that going, and that triggers a fart, always.
translation.it: annusi per starnutire e lo starnuto scatena il peto.

translation.en: What's up with this school bus?
translation.it: Che ci fa qui il pulmino della scuola?

translation.en: Okay. I stole it.
What? Put your hands in the air.
And wave them like you just don't care Say "ho"
translation.it: Agitatele di qua e di là Dite "ho"

translation.en: Say "ho"
-I heard you're having a party tonight, Lenny. -What? I'm not having a party.
translation.it: Lenny, ho saputo che stasera dai una festa. Cosa? No, nessuna festa.

translation.en: -Where did you hear that? -He's a cop. He hears everything.
translation.it: Chi te l'ha detto? È uno sbirro. Sa tutto.

translation.en: Oh, God.
Look, it's Magnum P.U.
Look at him getting all serious. I still can't believe...
translation.it: Guardate che arie da duro. Come hai fatto

translation.en: ...you're a cop after all the sick stuff you did growing up.
translation.it: a diventare uno sbirro con quello che combinavi da ragazzo?

translation.en: The Peter Dante who stole your parents' snowmobile...
translation.it: Il Peter Dante che rubava la motoslitta dei tuoi

translation.en: ...and sold it to purchase crack cocaine is dead, Feder.
translation.it: per comprarsi il crack non c'è più, Feder.

translation.en: This side of the law is way better. To serve and protect. Got to love it.
translation.it: Preferisco questo lato della legge. Servire e proteggere. Mi piace.

translation.en: Hey, McKenzie, I heard you assaulted somebody in there.
translation.it: McKenzie, ho saputo che hai aggredito qualcuno.

translation.en: I didn't assault anybody. I just choked out your brother.
translation.it: Non ho aggredito nessuno. Ho solo strangolato tuo fratello.

translation.en: Yeah, he deserves it. He's crazy.
translation.it: Sì, se lo merita. È fuori di testa.

translation.en: We got five minutes to get to that stupid recital.
translation.it: Tra cinque minuti inizia quello stupido saggio.

translation.en: Recital?
-At McDonough Elementary? -Yes.
-Can I come? -Why?
Trust me. Everybody's got to go.
We got five minutes. We're never gonna make it there.
translation.it: Mancano cinque minuti. Non ce la faremo mai.

translation.en: You'll get there on time. We're gonna give you a four-alarm presidential police escort.
translation.it: Ce la farete, perché vi scorteremo a sirene spiegate come le macchine presidenziali.

translation.en: -Isn't that against the law? -I am the law!
translation.it: Non è contro la legge? La legge sono io!

translation.en: What's happening?
Oh, my God! What just happened?
Welcome, parents, to final performance of school year...
...our June-a-licious Dance Spectacular!
translation.it: alla delizia di giugno, il Dance Spectacular!

translation.en: Now, for this year, we go throwing a few hip-hop moves in there.
translation.it: Quest'anno, abbiamo aggiunto alcuni movimenti hip-hop.

translation.en: Like this.
Is fun to dance.
Let the show begin.
So nice of you to invite your friends and the bus driver...
translation.it: Sei stato carino a invitare i tuoi amici, l'autista del pulmino

translation.en: ...and the police force to our daughter's dance recital.
translation.it: e la polizia al saggio di nostra figlia.

translation.en: Yeah, huge ballet fans, all of them.
translation.it: Sono tutti grandi appassionati di balletto.

translation.en: She's so cute.
-So cute. -She's adorable, isn't she?
She is adorable.
-Fantastic stuff. -Unbelievable.
-Look at her go. -I am. I'm looking at her.
I want to arrest her for disturbing the peace.
translation.it: Voglio arrestarla per disturbo della quiete.

translation.en: In my pants.
I'm having a wonderful time.
She's got a solo?
What?
It's fine. I just wish that you would give me more than eight hours' notice....
translation.it: Va bene. Vorrei solo essere avvertita un po' prima,

translation.en: ...before you tell me that we're throwing a party, babe.
translation.it: quando decidi di dare una festa.

translation.en: It's not a party. Get out of here.
It's a couple people coming by.
How'd you like it?
-Hey! -You were great, honey.
Where did you learn to dance like that?
translation.it: Dove hai imparato a ballare così?

translation.en: She moves like Yagger, no?
Yes, she does, she moves like Mick Yagger. Is that what she was saying?
translation.it: Sì, si muove come... Mick Yagger? Parla come te.

translation.en: -Hey, butter buns, you ready to grab some eats? -Yes.
translation.it: Ehi, focaccina. Andiamo a mangiare un boccone? Va bene.

translation.en: -Cavanaugh. -Lenny Feder, I'll be damned.
translation.it: Cavanaugh. Lenny Feder, non ci posso credere.

translation.en: Honey, this is Tommy Cavanaugh.
He was my old steroid that I grew up with.
translation.it: Lo steroide umano con cui sono cresciuto.

translation.en: -This is my.... -Wife. Roxanne.
-Why are your hands shaking, Daddy? -My hands are shaking?
translation.it: Perché ti tremano le mani, papà? Mi tremano le mani?

translation.en: Probably because I had too much coffee this morning, sweetheart.
translation.it: Forse perché ho bevuto troppi caffè stamattina, tesoro.

translation.en: I heard you been running around saying you could take me in a fight.
translation.it: Ho saputo che vai in giro a dire che ti batteresti con me.

translation.en: -You? I wouldn't say that. -Yeah, you did, this morning in Kmart.
translation.it: Hai... Non lo direi mai. L'hai detto stamattina da Kmart.

translation.en: Kmart? Was I there?
-I don't think I was there. -You know, all I can remember about this guy...
translation.it: -Non mi pare. -Sai, per quel che ricordo,

translation.en: ...is smacking him around whenever I wanted to...
...and him not doing a single thing about it.
Yeah, we had a lot of good times like that growing up.
translation.it: Già, ce la spassavamo, da ragazzi.

translation.en: Why is your voice so shaky, Daddy? Are you crying?
translation.it: Perché hai la voce tremolante, papà? Ti viene da piangere?

translation.en: -You don't stop talking, do you? -Honey, we should be getting going.
translation.it: Vuoi stare zitta? Tesoro, è meglio andare.

translation.en: Sure, baby.
I want you to stop making up lies about kicking my ass...
translation.it: Smettila di raccontare balle sulle tue bravate

translation.en: -...or I'm gonna have to set you straight. -Sure, sure, sure.
translation.it: o ti sistemo io. Certo, sì.

translation.en: I'll see you around.
Becky, you be having great summer.
translation.it: Becky, ti auguro una bella estate.

translation.en: I was one inch away from knocking that guy out, and I swear to God.
translation.it: C'è mancato un pelo che gli spaccassi la faccia, te lo assicuro.

translation.en: -No, you weren't. -This is grown-up talk, so butt out!
translation.it: Invece no. Sono discorsi da adulti, quindi fatti i cavoli tuoi!

translation.en: That's insane! What did you say to him?
I said, "Hey, Cavanaugh, you speak to me like that again...
translation.it: Gli ho detto: "Cavanaugh, prova ancora a parlarmi così

translation.en: ...in front of my wife and kid, I will brush your teeth with a brick."
translation.it: "davanti a mia moglie e a mia figlia e ti spacco tutti i denti."

translation.en: No, you didn't. You just yelled at me.
translation.it: No, invece. Te la sei presa con me.

translation.en: -I don't yell at you! -Calm down.
No, I'm just saying. You guys were in the bathroom.
translation.it: No, davvero. Voi eravate in bagno.

translation.en: Look who's here, everybody.
Twenty Voss waters, right?
-That's how they do it in Hollyweird. -I don't know.
We haven't lived there in, what, 10 months now or something?
translation.it: Non abitiamo più lì da almeno 10 mesi.

translation.en: As a matter of fact, our son starts work here tonight.
translation.it: A dire il vero, da stasera nostro figlio lavorerà qui.

translation.en: I know. I heard you brown-nosed Mr. Pappas, and now Showbiz Junior's got a job.
translation.it: Lo so. Avete leccato i piedi al sig. Pappas e ora Hollywood Jr. ha un lavoro.

translation.en: I used to scoop cones here, and why shouldn't he?
translation.it: Anch'io vendevo gelati qui. Perché non può farlo lui?

translation.en: It's a great first job for a kid.
Or lifetime job.
Okay, what are we having?
-Becky, what do you want, hon? -Can I have the soft chocolate cup, please?
translation.it: Becky, che gelato vuoi? Posso avere una coppa di mousse al cioccolato?

translation.en: Here's a word you probably never heard, no.
translation.it: Ti dirò una parola che forse non hai mai sentito: no.

translation.en: -The machine's busted, princess. -Bummer, it's broken? Like all your dreams?
translation.it: La macchina è guasta. Che peccato. È in frantumi come tutti i tuoi sogni?

translation.en: It's easy to fix. I can help you with that.
translation.it: Si aggiusta facilmente. Ti aiuto io.

translation.en: What do you know about fixing ice-cream machines, Higgins?

translation.en: -Lenny! -Yes?
The leg is broken!
You can't undo this.

translation.en: -Another one of your jokes, huh? -I wish.

translation.en: Scully, is that you?
Hey, what's up, fellas?
Are you taking your driver's test drunk?
Yeah, I'm MC Hammered!
-You're a madman! -Hey, Scully, Scully.
Have you seen those old townies from the quarry today?

They disrespected our frat house!
-Man, they disrespected the crap out of it! -No, can't have that.

translation.en: Brewski time, dude!
It's not for you, Scully.
It's for that freak in the hat next to you. Looks like he needs it.

translation.en: -Boom! -Yeah! That just happened!
Kill! Kill! Kill!
Taking your driver's test while intoxicated?

translation.en: Minus five points.
This is ridiculous!
I've wasted an entire day waiting for this idiot to show up.

translation.en: Did you tell him your son-in-law works for the cable company?

translation.en: A fat lot of good being related to that bozo would do me.
translation.it: Sai che vantaggio, essere imparentata con quel buono a nulla.

translation.en: I'm gonna run to the bathroom.
Love to the children.
Yes. Yes.
Damn it, I just sat down.
I'll be right out there! Hang on!
I'm coming as quick as I can. I got bunions, damn it!
translation.it: Arrivo il prima possibile. Ho la borsite, dannazione!

translation.en: You burn in hell!
You cable-installing mother-- Damn it!
Look, man, I know deadbeat dads always have lame excuses...
translation.it: Senti, i padri falliti trovano sempre scuse assurde

translation.en: ...why they don't see their kids.
But "I didn't know you existed till about a week ago"...
translation.it: ma "fino a una settimana fa non sapevo neanche che esistessi"

translation.en: ...is actually a fantastic excuse, so can you cut me some slack?
translation.it: è una scusa fantastica. Che ne dici di farmi riprovare?

translation.en: Her name's not Hiccups McGee.
Yeah, I know that.
-So why do you call her that? -No, that's just-- It's stupid.
translation.it: Allora perché la chiami così? Ecco, perché... Per un motivo stupido.

translation.en: It's just kind of a nickname I give people that...
translation.it: È un soprannome che do alle persone

translation.en: ...you know, have a distinct trait or physical feature.

translation.en: Like, if someone had big lips, you'd call them Lippy McGee.

translation.en: And if they sneezed a lot, you'd call them Sneezy McGee.

translation.en: So you'd be Ugly McGee.
I'd be Ugly McGee. Exactly.
-Shorty McGee. -Shorty McGee, sure.

translation.en: -Viagra McGee. -Right, right. You get it, you get it.
translation.it: Viagra McGee. Va bene. Hai capito.

translation.en: Listen, man, I'm willing to give this a try if you are.

translation.en: You know what they say: Yesterday's history, tomorrow's a mystery.

translation.en: Maybe we go inside and search the Internet for funny videos of squirrels waterskiing.

translation.en: Okay, we're getting somewhere.
I'm sorry I lied about the appointment.
The lying is not the worst part.

You know, she always takes my side...
...worries if I'm eating enough and taking my vitamins.

You're right. You know, there's only so many hours in a day...
translation.it: Hai ragione. La giornata è corta

translation.it: e sto sempre dietro ai bambini. Forse ti taglio un po' fuori,

translation.it: Invece sì, perché oggi al saggio

And I'm totally fine with that.

translation.en: As long as he was gay, dead or a cartoon.

translation.en: -Gay. -Okay.
But no matter who or what we look at, we'll always come back to each other, right?

-Support our team! -I'll prove it to you!
Car wash!
-What are you doing? -No, no, you're gonna like this.
Hi, girls!

Wash it up extra soapy!
You got it.
Wait, hang on. There's a car just in front of you. Better do them first.

translation.en: Extra soapy.
What is happening right now?
I swear, I didn't plan this.

translation.en: No, no, no. Thank you. I'm good. I'm good, thank you.

translation.en: Well, I might as well enjoy this.
Why is this never-ending?
At least the guys in the car in front of us are having fun.

translation.en: Okay, everybody.
It wasn't a perfect day. I admit it. There were some downs.

translation.en: Sorry about the leg.
The good news is the children got through another year of school. Fabulously.

translation.en: You got older, even though I told you not to, especially you.
translation.it: State crescendo, anche se vi ho detto di non farlo, specie a te.

translation.en: Stay young. Don't leave me.
You prepared us your famous chicken à la food poisoning...

translation.en: ...which we're all excited to eat. I'm just kidding.
translation.it: che siamo ansiosi di mangiare. Stavo scherzando.

translation.en: But the greatest thing is, it's my favorite part of the day with my four best friends.

translation.en: -To the Feders! -Yeah!
So Bumpty asked me out for ice cream today.

Here you go.

...like I did the last time?

They're not all tens, buddy.
Homeboy, why aren't you eating?

What?

It doesn't come off.

The '80s?
The '80s?

Why?
